thread.title: Fantastic hotel and great location
thread.title_full: Fantastic hotel and great location - Review of Hyatt Centric Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Helen N
title: Fantastic hotel and great location
text:
I love this hotel!
The location is fantastic, literally a minutes walk from Times Square. Our room was huge with floor to ceiling windows so we had some great views. The staff and the concierge particularly were very helpful and friendly, everyone always had a smile and a kind word for you. We had a few cocktails in the rooftop bar, definitely worth a visit, we got some great photos of the Chrysler building all lit up at night there.
I would absolutely stay here again no problem, we loved it!
